import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { MovieService } from './../movie.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { IMovie } from '../movie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { movieList: IMovie[] = []; constructor( private service: MovieService, private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute ){} ngOnInit() : void{ this.service.getMovies().subscribe((result) => { console.log(result); console.log(result[1]); this.movieList = result; }); } OnEditMovie(): void{ const editUrl = '/movies/edit/'; this.router.navigate([editUrl], { relativeTo: this.route}); } OnDeleteMovie(id: number){ if(confirm("Do you really wanna delete this movie?")){ this.service.deleteMovies(id).subscribe((result) => { window.location.reload(); }); } } }
